item.title: Liferay Portal 4.3 Final Released
item.description: Liferay Portal 4.3 Final was released yesterday. At work, I have to develop a server communicate with mobile device based-on Liferay portal. Iâ€™m very pleasure with this version of Liferay, mobile device is supported :-).
